CatDescriptText: Mrs. Regis Bobonis, housewife, 2528 Mahon Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 26, 1959, pg. A1, with question: "Do you believe in divorce even though most religious groups frown upon it, and some actually ban it except under very extenuating circumstances?" answer reads: "No. It's immoral because of religious reasons.  I believe each person should have one mate."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. Regis Bobonis wearing light colored diamond patterned suit jacket with dark collar and dress with matching trim, standing outside of Jenkins Arcade, Thrift Drugs store in background, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
